message: Let's start with a generous offer, Bob. Accept and we can shake on it!
Let's split it down the middle, Alice! Fair and square.
A bit more for me, considering the inflation, right?
I'll give you a bit more, but not that much, Alice. You're not getting away that easily!
You're not giving me enough, Bob! I'm willing to take a bit less, but I need a better deal.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Alice, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of either. This is my final offer.
I'm starting to get worried, Bob. I'll take this deal, but only if you accept it now.
I'm not going to make it easy for you, Alice. I'll give you a 50/50 split, but you'll have to take it or leave it.
